directions: [["Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain well. Preheat oven to 400."],["In small, heavy saucepan melt butter or margarine, remove from heat and stir in flour until smooth. Add milk, return to burner and cook, stirring constantly, until as thick as thin cream. "],["Stir in mustard, salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce. "],["Grease a medium sized baking dish. Place a layer of cooked macaroni on bottom of pan. Add a layer of cheese. Repeat until the dish is full, topping with a layer of shredded cheese."],["Pour sauce over macaroni and cheese. "],["Sprinkle bread crumbs on top. Bake uncovered at 400 for 25 minutes."],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: For a heartier supper dish, add a layer of sliced ham between layers.
